LanguageData.Hare.label: ノウサギ
LanguageData.Hare.description: この小さな孤独な生き物は、危険からぴょんぴょん跳んで離れていきます。
LanguageData.Snowhare.label: snowhare
LanguageData.Snowhare.description: This hardy, animal survives the brutal winters of the north by burrowing through snow and finding prey underneath, or hibernating the worst months away.
